text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On the morning of tryouts,<n>Umamusume get ready to show
off<n>their skills in hopes of being scouted<n>by spectating
trainers.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! It's sooo touching!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No matter the distance, they have the<n>guts to move forward,
step by tiny<n>step! They don't give in, even with<n>those little
bodies! Be brave and carry<n>that huge load!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wahaaagh! It's so... It's so<n>amaziiing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You're amazing, little ants!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Ants are the best!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: They're trying... so hard! Waaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wait! Don't tell me! You're gearing to<n>go after watching
them too, am I<n>right?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I know just how you feel!<n>Seeing them work their
hearts out<n>really boosts my spirits! Fills me with<n>courage!
Sets my soul on fiiire!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm exactly the same! Today's a<n>super important race, but
now I know I<n>can blast through it!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The ants got me ready to win,and I've made a new friendwho's as pumped from watchingthem as I am...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm WAAAY happy! Whoo-hooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Oh geez, she thinks I'm into ants...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hey... Would you stop screaming?<n>It's still morning, and
your yelling's<n>rattling my head.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Taishin! It's Taishin! Good<n>mooorning! I'm so glad to
see you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Right in my ears now... Ugh, that hurts.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Seriously... Not that I care, but do you<n>really have time to idle
away here?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Idle? I'm never idling. I'm always<n>geared up and ready to
go!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's not what I mean, dummy!<n>Aren't you also racing in
today's<n>tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
If you are, you'd better stop standing<n>around staring at
ants!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh my gooosh! No way! It's<n>time already?! Thanks,
Taishin. You're<n>so kind for telling me!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I mean... sniffle... really... Yourfriendship... just means... so muuuch!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Who said anything about friendship?!<n>Ugh, whatever. This
girl is crazy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wha! Wait, wait, wait! I'm coming too!<n>Welp, fellow ant-fan,
guess I'll see ya<n>arooound!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a weird way to start the day, but I<n>decide to head over
to the racetrack<n>as well.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tons of trainers are already at the<n>track talking about
who's racing<n>today, each looking to meet the most<n>
talented Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some are even discussing the<n>energetic student from
earlier, Winning<n>Ticket...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ticket's in the 1,200-meter turf race! I<n>just love the way
she runs. She never<n>holds back!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Sure, but it's not always good to go in<n>full charge. That
no-holds-barred spirit<n>is commendable, but you can't win a<n>
race with heart alone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, it comes to the last race of the<n>tryouts, and Winning
Ticket is there...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leaders crossed the 600-meter<n>mark! What a sudden
turn of events!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Everybody's running all out!<n>Nooo sweat! Time for
me to go all out<n>too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And here comes Winning Ticket!<n>She's not far behind and
gaining<n>speed! That's some amazing<n>sprinting!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She got off to an extraordinary start,<n>but then...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hrgh! Uuugh! Full... poweeer...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're round the fourth corner and<n>into the final stretch!
Winning Ticket's<n>falling behind! She's losing it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her outstanding opening<n>performance, she's
unable to sustain<n>her lead, and finishes in fifth place.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ghaaaaah! This is the wooorst!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I won't let it stop me! I'm not<n>gonna quit! One day, I'm
for sure<n>gonna—

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ticket! The results might not have<n>been what you wanted...
but you ran a<n>nice race! Good job out there!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wha! W-wow... Thank you! Wait,<n>could it be? Are you
scouting me?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoo-hooooo! Together, we'll<n>definitely win...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: THE JAPANESE DERBY!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Murmur...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A rush of hushed voices all utter in<n>disbelief at the idea of
Winning Ticket<n>winning the Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Th-the Japanese Derby? Um, Ticket,<n>are you saying you
want to be a<n>Derby champion?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! You've got that right! That's<n>the reason I came to
Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Listen... I'm sorry. You're one heck<n>of a sprinter, but I don't
have what it<n>takes to get you ready for the<n>Japanese
Derby... I'm really sorry.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What? Hey, wait a sec!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket attempts to stop the<n>reluctant trainer from
leaving, but to no<n>avail.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Awww, I couldn't get scouted... I<n>could just... cryyyyy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But I won't back down! I won't give<n>up!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I have to go all out until the day I win<n>the Derby! Full
Speeeeed!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She stubbornly keeps repeating that<n>she'll win the derby as
she<n>disappears in the distance. It leaves<n>quite the
impression.
